name: financial-assistance-platform
description: AI-Minded Investor aims to revolutionize the investment industry by using artificial intelligence to analyze market trends, find promising startups, and create profitable investment portfolios.
uniqueSellingPoints: Cutting-edge AI Algorithms for market analysis and investment opportunities.
Streamlined investment platform accessible through website, mobile app, and Telegram bot integration.
Utility token creation for incentivizing users and enabling exclusive features.
Data-driven content automation and targeted marketing strategy leveraging AI insights.

Q1 2023: Telegram bot integration to receive AI-driven market predictions.
Content Automation and API key integration.
Q2 2023: Website and mobile app development & launch.
Utility token creation, integration, and promotion.
Targeted marketing strategy based on AI insights.
Q3 2023: Partnerships with promising startups and major investment firms.
Ongoing platform maintenance, security updates, and new feature developments.
